[{"id":"nnvMTG5Sl5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🫂Ministries Manual","col":12}},{"id":"B-CtTCmVDX","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The ministries module contains features related to events and specific ministries of the church.","col":12}},{"id":"w8oEjl0tNc","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🗓️Events","col":12}},{"id":"riOh9J0you","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Church events are used to track attendance and for linking to other documents.","col":12}},{"id":"6k3AeERCdQ","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"When creating an event, note the following:
- Default event types are provided, but additional event types can be created.
    - When creating an event type, you can choose an existing event as a 'template event'. This will allow you to click the 'Fill From Template' button when creating this type of event in the future to fill in most of the event details using the template event's values.
- Other documents can be linked as items in the event's schedule (i.e. Songs, Presentations, People, Bible References, etc)
- Attendance can be tracked (Additional attendance types can be added if needed)
    - To pre-populate attendance for an event, you can select a 'template event' in the related event type. Then clicking the 'Fill From Template' button will pre-populate all attendance records from the template event.","col":12}},{"id":"_0iXv3IWcn","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Ministries workspace includes links to event and attendance reports.","col":12}},{"id":"bLMhfdXsV3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🎵Songs","col":12}},{"id":"7ts41_VmsH","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Songs can be added as items to a church event.
Note: there is not currently a way to present a song. This is planned in future versions.","col":12}},{"id":"ljVNwCikn3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"When creating a song, note the following:
- If you know the CCLI number for the song, you can add it. This may be used in future enhancements.
- You can add any number of slides to a song.
- After creating a song, you may want to add it to an event's schedule.","col":12}}]
